metadata.synopsis: Players comment the black blood is actually oil and it's coming from inside the building.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Pass a perception check near the oil at the Dock warehouse,CTY_Main_A: -172.87, 2.57, -147.85Only triggers after having the quest from the Waveservants who mentioned the black blood.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Blood? No - oil. Leading right inside.
